content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment to be a great place to live. How much were you thinking of paying for the rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mr. Schmidt. Considering the apartment is unfurnished and in the city center, I was thinking of paying 500 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than I was expecting. The location and the amenities nearby justify a higher price. How about we start at 750 euros per month? It's a fair price for the area and the quality of the apartment. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your offer, Mr. Schmidt. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment, I'm not sure it justifies a rent of 750 euros per month. I propose we meet in the middle at 625 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hmm, 625 euros is still quite a bit lower than my initial offer. I'm willing to go down to 700 euros per month as a compromise. This is the lowest I can go considering the high demand for apartments in this area. What is your final offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for considering my offer, Mr. Schmidt. I propose we meet in the middle at 662.50 euros per month.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I'm sorry, but I can't accept that price. It's simply not high enough for the location and the quality of the apartment. If you're interested in the apartment, I suggest you reconsider your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for your time, Mr. Schmidt. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I cannot afford the price you are suggesting. I will find an apartment that fits within my budget.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your situation, but I must insist on a price that reflects the value of the apartment. If you're unable to afford my asking price, then I'm sorry, but we cannot proceed. Good luck in finding a suitable place within your budget. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
